name: Zahra Ghasemi
aboutMeDescription: Hello, I am an intern UI/UX designer.I am 22 years old and I studied computer engineering at Islamic Azad University.I am very interested in solving challenges and collaborating in the UI/UX design field.
portfolio1Caption: In fact, a landing page is a page of the site that is used as a landing point for a visitor. In simpler words, it is the same page that is shown to the user before entering the main site and encourages him to take an action on the site. Usually, these pages include actions such as registering users on the site.Click on a specific link.Selling a specific product.Increasing the number of visits to an article is done.
portfolio2Caption: In the online bookstore project, things like the user's path from the time of entering the site, choosing and buying goods, payment, etc. have been studied and designed so that the user can have the best interaction with the system.
portfolio3Caption: Dashboards are a powerful opportunity to influence user behavior and boost retention
portfolio4Caption: In the music player, the user should be able to access the list of music on any page he is on and go to the next and previous music. He should also be able to create a list to separate the music for himself and change it.
portfolio5Caption: In the ticket reservation system, different ticket purchase modes, transportation service schedules, different site filters, etc. should be considered for the best possible access of the user to the desired ticket. This project has not yet been completed and There is room for improvement.
certificate1title: Foundations of User Experience (UX) Design from Google
certificate2title: Principles of UX/UI Design from Meta
ShayanHamidiC: Zahra showed a high level of web designing technical skills and was a valuable contributor the projects.She denotes a lot of analytical capability and willingness for both her personal & professional development. She learns quickly and I would have no hesitation in working with Zahra once again in the future.
MahdisNazemiC: Zahra is one of the most committed people I know and always tries her hardest to do her work. I am sure she will be one of the most successful people in this field.
MohammadKhaniP: Front-end Team Lead at Nodin Soft
MohammadKhaniC: Zahra is one of the best among all people I have ever worked with. She is always punctual, her knowledge is vast and extensive. Excellent and result driven. Works towards maximal customer satisfaction. Give her the really challenging tasks, the ones that everyone else is struggling with, and she will get them done. She is a trustworthy person and I will always hold him in the highest esteem.
